about_the_game:
Step into the immersive world of Maze of Fear and prepare to be consumed by its dark and enigmatic realms. As you navigate through the intricately designed mazes, your heart will race with each twist and turn. With minimalist graphics that add to the sense of mystery, this game will captivate your senses and test your courage.



Uncover the secrets that lie within the depths of the maze as you solve mind-bending puzzles and overcome treacherous obstacles. The atmosphere will keep you on the edge of your seat, as eerie sounds and haunting visuals create an atmosphere of palpable fear.



Maze of Fear challenges not only your problem-solving skills but also your ability to confront your deepest fears. Each step you take will bring you closer to the truth, but it may also unleash unexpected terrors. Will you have the courage to face them head-on and emerge victorious?



Immerse yourself in the haunting atmosphere of Maze of Fear, where every step you take is shrouded in uncertainty. The maze is filled with hidden dangers and enigmatic puzzles that will challenge your wit and determination. As you progress, the stakes will rise, and the fear will intensify, pushing you to your limits.



But fear not, for within the maze also lie moments of triumph and revelation. Each puzzle solved and each obstacle conquered will bring you closer to unlocking the maze's ultimate secrets. It's a journey that will test your resilience and reward your perseverance, offering a sense of accomplishment that only overcoming true fear can bring.



With its unique blend of gripping gameplay, immersive atmosphere, and thought-provoking challenges, Maze of Fear is an experience that will leave a lasting impression on your gaming soul. Brace yourself for a thrilling adventure that will challenge your mind, quicken your pulse, and ignite your sense of adventure. Are you ready to face the maze and conquer your deepest fears?

content_descriptors.notes: This game features elements of fear and horror, providing a chilling experience.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Operating System: macOS 10.12 Sierra or later
  • Processor: Processor: Intel Core i53or above
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Additional Notes: Please note that these system requirements are provided for a game size of 6 GB. It's important to ensure that your system meets or exceeds these requirements to have a smooth and enjoyable gaming experience.
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Operating System: macOS 11 Big Sur or later
  • Processor: Processor: Intel Core i5 or above
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM

name: Nexus Warfare

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Operating System: Windows 7 or later
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 or AMD Ryzen 3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 750 or AMD Radeon R7 260X
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Please note that these system requirements are provided for a game size of 6 GB. It's important to ensure that your system meets or exceeds these requirements to have a smooth and enjoyable gaming experience.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Operating System: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 or AMD Ryzen 5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 or AMD Radeon RX 580
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

short_description: Embark on a thrilling adventure through mysterious worlds, conquering obstacles and unraveling intriguing puzzles. Immerse yourself in minimalist graphics and uncover secrets in this unique gaming experience. Get ready for surprises!
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Simplified Chinese, Finnish, Japanese, Korean, Norwegian, Portuguese - Portugal, Russian, Turkish, Greek, Swedish
*languages with full audio support
